body_html: I see that the raw_rnn API has been updated a few weeks ago to allow hidden state reordering, as required by beam search. This means that using it will likely yield the cleanest and most computationally efficient way to integrate beam search with tensorflow.
body_text: I see that the raw_rnn API has been updated a few weeks ago to allow hidden state reordering, as required by beam search. This means that using it will likely yield the cleanest and most computationally efficient way to integrate beam search with tensorflow.
body: I see that the `raw_rnn` API has been updated a few weeks ago to allow hidden state reordering, as required by beam search. This means that using it will likely yield the cleanest and most computationally efficient way to integrate beam search with tensorflow.
